    @allure.title("TC-02: Login with empty phone number should show validation")
    def test_empty_phone_number(self, page, login_page):
        with allure.step("Open login page"):
            page.goto("https://dev.bito.uz/login")
    
        with allure.step("Enter password only"):
            login_page.enter_password("12345")
    
        with allure.step("Click login button"):
            login_page.click_login_button()
    
        with allure.step("Check expected validation message"):
            error_text = login_page.get_error_text()
            print("ERROR = ", error_text)
